EmailTemplate.subject: Attention Hawker Operators - Discount Package Pricing on ADS-B & FMS 6.1
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
<[[https://aerospace.honeywell.com/]]>
Dear Hawker Operator, Honeywell has a special discount pricing in effect when you combine ADS-B Out and FMS 6.1 upgrades. This opportunity provides these advantages:
- Your aircraft will be globally compliant with the 2020 ADS-B Out Mandate. The package includes an ADS-B capable RM-855 exchange unit for either existing RM-855 or RM-850 Radio Management Unit, and an ADS-B capable RCZ Communications Radio Unit exchange for existing RCZ unit. - The on-wing loadable software FMS 6.1 upgrade provides access to the latest approaches, increased efficiency in the cockpit, growth to added features, and prevention of software obsolescence. - Affordable with minimized downtime!
- Maintenance Service Plan - Avionics* discount: Receive up to 50% off for the first year, and up to 25% off for the second and third year.** - 100% tax write-off in the first year for U.S.-based aircraft owners using the aircraft for business purposes.
This opportunity won't last long! Contact your preferred Honeywell Authorized Service Center or Honeywell Area Sales Manager for a complete price quote that includes parts, installation and the Maintenance Service Plan discount.*
* Formerly Honeywell Avionics Protection Plan (HAPP) **If interested in Maintenance Service Plan - Avionics discount, be sure to advise your installing dealer as offer is only applicable when purchasing certain supplemental type certificates.
